name: ATR-Filtered Triple EMA Momentum Crypto Strategy
description: Trades daily BTC and ETH using a triple-EMA momentum stack (12/26/50) validated by a 14-day ATR volatility filter. Entries occur when momentum flips direction and price confirms beyond an ATR threshold. Positions are sized at 2 % equity risk via fixed-fraction sizing. Risk is controlled with 1.5×ATR trailing stop-loss and 3×ATR take-profit on daily bars.
